frontmatter.title: BP_Unit_Anim_Debug
frontmatter.description: Child of Unit_Anim using the debug puppet. The debug puppet changes color and animation blueprint based on its faction and range. Useful for quick testing where you want to visualize factions.

frontmatter.title: BP_Unit_Anim
frontmatter.description: Child actor of Unit that modifies the movement functions with actions for displaying movement. Also includes a puppet child actor.This Puppet child actor displayed in the viewport when building a level is purely for visualization and will be deleted and replaced with a separate actor at runtime.

frontmatter.description: Used for spline paths that should just be a straight path between two points

frontmatter.title: BP_SplinePath_Path
frontmatter.description: Specifically used for movement paths. Adjusts and clean path points to fit the movement points before generatng the spline

frontmatter.description: Used by a GridUI to draw movement spline paths and outlines

frontmatter.title: BP_Character_Puppet
frontmatter.description: A puppet based on Character instead of Actor. Useful if you need to make use of the CharacterMovement component. Should be the puppet of a unit that accounts for the origin of the actor being in the center instead of at its feed. BP_Unit_Anim_Character is set up to account for this.

frontmatter.title: BP_Actor_Puppet_Debug
frontmatter.description: An example puppet that gets assigned its material and animation blueprint based on its faction and range. Intended for quickly debugging units that are obviously of different factions.

frontmatter.title: BP_Actor_Puppet_AutoRotateHealthBar
frontmatter.description: Puppet set up with a mesh based health bar that auto rotates to face the camera. Useful in cases where screen space UI does not work well, like in some VR applications.

frontmatter.title: BP_Actor_Puppet_BillboardHealthBar
frontmatter.description: A puppet actor that uses a billboard based health bar

nodes.excerpt: BP_Actor_Puppet Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Units/Puppets/BP_Actor_Puppet .. cpp:class:: BP_Actor_Puppet : public Actor An…

frontmatter.title: BP_Actor_Puppet
frontmatter.description: An example puppet actor, used by Unit actors to represent them visually in the game. Generally controlled by Actions and should not affect gameplay logic.

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_MovingPlatform
frontmatter.description: Companion action to BP_Interact_Mover for moving a platform to a location, attaching any unit standing on the platform and moving it along.

nodes.excerpt: BP_Action_Move2D Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Maps/2D/Actions/BP_Action_Move2D .. cpp:class:: BP_Action_Move2D : public BP…

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_LaunchBomb
frontmatter.description: Launches a bomb projectile at the specified end location in a physics based arc. Spawns a BP_Bomb actor for this purpose. By default used in BP_Ability_Bomb

nodes.excerpt: BP_Action_Jump Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Maps/Demo/Actions/BP_Action_Jump .. cpp:class:: BP_Action_Jump : public BP_Action_C…

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_Jump
frontmatter.description: Moves the specified puppet in an arc between the specified locations and calls on it to play a jump animation.

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_LaserRifle
frontmatter.description: Shoots a laser beam at the target location, displaying damage to any hit targets if specified.

nodes.excerpt: BP_Action_Climb Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Maps/Demo/Actions/BP_Action_Climb .. cpp:class:: BP_Action_Climb : public BP_Action…

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_Climb
frontmatter.description: Signals the specified unit to use the climb animation, continuing once AnimationEnd is called on the puppet component of the animating actor. By default only works on the Demo puppets and only in standalone games (uses root motion)

nodes.excerpt: BP_Ability_Heal Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Maps/Advanced/Abilities/BP_Ability_Heal .. cpp:class:: BP_Ability_Heal : public BP…
BP_Ability_Bomb Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Maps/Advanced/Abilities/BP_Ability_Bomb .. cpp:class:: BP_Ability_Bomb : public BP…

frontmatter.title: BP_AbilityBase_SpawnUnits
frontmatter.description: Ability used for spawning units in the game. Used in the MpSpawn example map.

WBP_ATBTT Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/UI/WBP_ATBTT .. cpp:class:: WBP_ATBTT : public UserWidget A very simple HUD that…

frontmatter.title: WBP_ATBTT
frontmatter.description: A very simple HUD that shows if it's the Player or Enemy turn. Acts as an example for communication between other blueprints and the HUD.

BP_UnitHud Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Units/BP_UnitHud .. cpp:class:: BP_UnitHud : public WidgetComponent .. cpp:function…

frontmatter.title: BP_UnitStealthComponent
frontmatter.description: Must add BP_StealthSystem to BP_GridManager for this component to function. Units set to unaware are removed from initative at the start of the game. Can be specified on each component or for an entire faction (specify this in BP_StealthSystem). Handles listen and spot checks for unaware units.

nodes.excerpt: BP_Unit Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Units/BP_Unit .. cpp:class:: BP_Unit : public Actor The parent class for all Unit…

frontmatter.title: BP_Unit
frontmatter.description: The parent class for all Unit actors. Is intended to be invisible and work with data and gameplay logic. Visualizing the unit in game is handled bt a Puppet actor, which is spawned by the Unit at runtime.

nodes.excerpt: BP_Tile Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Tiles/BP_Tile .. cpp:class:: BP_Tile : public Actor The blueprint on which all tiles…

frontmatter.title: BP_Tile
frontmatter.description: The blueprint on which all tiles are based. To create a new tile, make a child of this blueprint or a duplicate of any other tile blueprint. Handles grid positioning and snapping and interacts with Grid Manager for instantiating meshes.

nodes.excerpt: BP_TurnManager Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/BP_TurnManager .. cpp:class:: BP_TurnManager : public Actor Handles starting…

frontmatter.title: BP_TurnManager
frontmatter.description: Handles starting and ending unit turns, holds the initiative order, current turn, current active unit and functions related to manipulating the turn order. This Turn Manager cycles through units by their faction.

frontmatter.title: BP_TurnManager_Strategy
frontmatter.description: This Turn Manager cycles through units by their faction, and the next unit will not be automatically selected when the current unit ends its turn.

nodes.excerpt: BP_SubGrid Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Grid/BP_SubGrid .. cpp:class:: BP_SubGrid : public Actor Creates grid sections that…

frontmatter.title: BP_SubGrid
frontmatter.description: Creates grid sections that are added to BP_GridManager on begin play as if they were part of BP_GridManager. Useful as an optimization measure if you have a very sparse grid instead of simply resizing BP_GridManager. Note that subgrids should not overlap any tiles of the grid manager or other subgrids. For overlapping levels use meshes blocking PathTrace.

nodes.excerpt: BP_StealthSystem Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Grid/BP_StealthSystem .. cpp:class:: BP_StealthSystem : public ActorComponent…

frontmatter.title: BP_StealthSystem
frontmatter.description: Add to the GridManager to enable the use of any StealthComponents added to units. Any such units that have factions set in UnawareFactions will not be added to initiative at the start of the game.

frontmatter.title: BP_TurnManager_Initiative
frontmatter.description: This Turn Manager cycles through units by their Initiative variable

frontmatter.title: BP_StatusEffect_Woke
frontmatter.description: Used by the Stealth component to notify when an unaware unit is alerted and will be added to initiative.

nodes.excerpt: BP_StatusEffect Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Abilities/BP_StatusEffect .. cpp:class:: BP_StatusEffect : public Actor Parent…

frontmatter.title: BP_StatusEffect
frontmatter.description: Parent blueprint for status effects. Holds events for when a status effect is activated and when the unit that has the status effect starts or ends its turn. These are intended to be defined in child actors of this blueprint.

nodes.excerpt: BP_Path_Simple Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Pathfinding/BP_Path_Simple .. cpp:class:: BP_Path_Simple : public BP_Path_C…

frontmatter.title: BP_Path_Simple
frontmatter.description: Pathfinding that considers the GridSimpleCosts map variable in BP_GridManager for determining cost. Useful in games where you want to set the cost of a tile globally instead of handling it through separate edge costs. UseSimpleCosts must be set to true in the GridManager for this to work.

nodes.excerpt: BP_Path_Teleport Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Pathfinding/BP_Path_Teleport .. cpp:class:: BP_Path_Teleport : public BP_Path…

frontmatter.title: BP_Path_SnakingHex
frontmatter.description: Variant pathfinding for hexagonal grids that prefers that units move in a snaking path between tiles over long curved lines, in cases where the move cost is equal. Might look better than standard pathfinding for huge open maps with long move ranges.

frontmatter.title: BP_PlayerController_ATBTT
frontmatter.description: Handles player login setup, keeping track of abilities and handling player input through communications with the GridCamera and abilities

nodes.excerpt: BP_Path_Range Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Pathfinding/BP_Path_Range .. cpp:class:: BP_Path_Range : public BP_Path_C A…

frontmatter.title: BP_Path_Range
frontmatter.description: A pathfinding type that simulates GetIndexesInRange. Ignores any barriers and considers all tiles as connected to their neighbors. Less efficient than GetIndexesInRange, but can be useful for some edge cases.

frontmatter.title: BP_Path_NoDiagonals
frontmatter.description: Ignores diagonal tile connections on square grids

frontmatter.title: BP_Path_PassThroughFriendly
frontmatter.description: Allows the unit to path through the space of units of the same faction

nodes.excerpt: BP_PathSpline Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Units/BP_PathSpline .. cpp:class:: BP_PathSpline : public Actor .. cpp:function…
BP_Path Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Pathfinding/BP_Path .. cpp:class:: BP_Path : public Object Handles default pathfinding…

frontmatter.title: BP_Path
frontmatter.description: Handles default pathfinding. Normally called on by GridManager with pathfinding type chosen as defined in the active unit.

frontmatter.title: BP_Path_IgnoreCost
frontmatter.description: Pathfinding that treats the move cost of entering all tiles as 1.

nodes.excerpt: BP_HUD_ATBTT Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/UI/BP_HUD_ATBTT .. cpp:class:: BP_HUD_ATBTT : public HUD .. cpp:function:: void…

BP_GridUI Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/GridUI/BP_GridUI .. cpp:class:: BP_GridUI : public Actor Handles UI elements to be…

frontmatter.title: BP_GridUI
frontmatter.description: Handles UI elements to be displayed on tiles. Mostly gets called on by abilities.

nodes.excerpt: BP_GridActor Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Grid/BP_GridActor .. cpp:class:: BP_GridActor : public Actor Template blueprint…

frontmatter.title: BP_GridActor
frontmatter.description: Template blueprint for blueprints that need to find the index they are placed on and be able to snap to the grid. Parent blueprint of Tile_Parent

nodes.excerpt: BP_GA_Platform Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Tiles/BP_GA_Platform .. cpp:class:: BP_GA_Platform : public BP_GridActor_C A…

frontmatter.title: BP_GA_Platform
frontmatter.description: A platform that is useful for creating multi-level grids. Turns invisible if the camera is zoomed close to reveal the levels below. Create child actors of this blueprint and replace the meshes with meshes of any size and shape.

nodes.excerpt: BP_GridManager_Adv Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Grid/BP_GridManager_Adv .. cpp:class:: BP_GridManager_Adv : public BP…

frontmatter.title: BP_GridManager_Adv
frontmatter.description: Just BP_GridManager with BP_CoverSystem and BP_StealthSystem added. You can add these components manually to a regular BP_GridManager and achieve the same result.

nodes.excerpt: BP_GridCamera Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/BP_GridCamera .. cpp:class:: BP_GridCamera : public Pawn Controls panning…

frontmatter.title: BP_GridCamera
frontmatter.description: Controls panning, zooming and rotating the camera as well as following the current pawn if EnableFollowCam is set to true

nodes.excerpt: BP_GridManager_Hex Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Grid/BP_GridManager_Hex .. cpp:class:: BP_GridManager_Hex : public BP…

frontmatter.title: BP_GridManager_Hex
frontmatter.description: Child of BP_GridManager which overrides certain functions to enable hexagonal grids.

nodes.excerpt: BP_GA_Interact Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Grid/BP_GA_Interact .. cpp:class:: BP_GA_Interact : public BP_GridActor_C…

frontmatter.title: BP_ExternalAction_Component
frontmatter.description: Add to actors you want to serve as external actions, in which you want to play actions as if they were BP_Action type actors by using BP_Action_ExternalAction. Also add BPI_ExternalAction. This component's only purpose is to hold the OnExternalActionDone event dispatcher, which should be called at the end of the external action to signal to BP_Action_ExternalAction that it is done and that we can return to the regular action queue.

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_UpdateAbilityBox
frontmatter.description: Calls on the ability box to update to show the available abilities, charges and cooldowns for the specified ability system component. By default called when a unit with the ability system component is selected.

nodes.excerpt: BP_CoverSystem Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Grid/BP_CoverSystem .. cpp:class:: BP_CoverSystem : public ActorComponent When…

frontmatter.title: BP_CoverSystem
frontmatter.description: When added to the Grid Manager, generates the GridCoverTiles variable using the CoverTrace channel, storing cover values based on the blocking height of meshes blocking this channel. Is utilized by abilities (such as BP_Ability_LaserRifle) to modify accuracy.

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_SpawnEmitter
frontmatter.description: Spawns an emitter at the specified location, with an optional input for playing a sound.

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_StoreTurnInfo
frontmatter.description: Stores the Current Turn and Active Actor in special Animate variables in the Turn Manager. Useful if you need to know what turn and active actor is currently being displayed to the player (the actual current turn and active actor might be different, since the action system is asynchronous and can lag behind)

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_SpawnActor
frontmatter.description: Spawns the specified actor. As this is done in the action queue the actor should only be used for cosmetic event and not for gameplay logic. For actors relevant for gameplay logic it is recommended to not use this action. Instead spawn it without an action on the server and then unhide it as an action.

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_SignalActorDone
frontmatter.description: Allows the turn manager to wait for all ongoing actions before starting the next turn. This action is unconventional as it bridges the action queue and gameplay logic. The primary purpose is to make debugging easier, as you can be certain that any actions playing will relate to the current active actor. Also prevents infinite loops for long lasting AI vs AI matches, as the AI units will have to wait for the last unit's actions to end before running its AI logic.

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_SetActorVisibility
frontmatter.description: Sets the specified actor to HiddenInGame (or disables this)

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_PrintString
frontmatter.description: For printing strings as part of the action queue. For debugging.

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_ShowSelection
frontmatter.description: Shows that an actor has been selected by the player or AI. Calls on the GridCamera to follow the actor and calls on the GridUI to mark the actor (by default displaying an active unit marker below the actor)

nodes.excerpt: BP_Action_PanCamera Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Actions/BP_Action_PanCamera .. cpp:class:: BP_Action_PanCamera : public BP…

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_PanCamera
frontmatter.description: Calls on the grid camera to pan to the specified location

nodes.excerpt: BP_Action_PlaySound Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Actions/BP_Action_PlaySound .. cpp:class:: BP_Action_PlaySound : public BP…

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_PlaySound
frontmatter.description: Plays a sound with the specified settings.

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_ModfiyHealth
frontmatter.description: Calls on the specified puppet to animate changing health. For the default puppets this means changing the fill of the health bar. If damage is taken (not healed) call on the puppet to play a hurt animation. If specified calls on the puppet to play a death animation (and hide the health bar on the default puppets)

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_LerpMoveActor
frontmatter.description: Moves the specified actor from its current position to the specified EndLocation through a lerp

nodes.excerpt: BP_Action_Move Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Actions/BP_Action_Move .. cpp:class:: BP_Action_Move : public BP_Action_C From…

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_Move
frontmatter.description: From the specified locations, generates a spline path and moves the MovedActor along it, calling on it to play a move animation (can be specified on the moved actor)

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_DisplayTileMarkers
frontmatter.description: Displays tile markers on the tiles specified by the input array and of a type specified by the MarkerType input, as interpreted by the GridUI. Calls on the default GridUI unless otherwise specified.

nodes.excerpt: BP_Action_GameOver Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Actions/BP_Action_GameOver .. cpp:class:: BP_Action_GameOver : public BP…

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_GameOver
frontmatter.description: Displays Game Over in the center of the screen

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_DisplayStatusEffect
frontmatter.description: Displays a status effect icon on the Unit HUD of the specified puppet

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_DisplayCenterText
frontmatter.description: Displays the specified text in large letters in the center of the screen on WBP_ATBTT for a specified duration. By default used to display faction turns when using the Strategy Turn Manager

nodes.excerpt: BP_Action_External Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Actions/BP_Action_External .. cpp:class:: BP_Action_External : public BP…

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_External
frontmatter.description: Offloads playing the action to a separate actor. Useful when doing complex actions where you would otherwise need to add lots of action inputs. Keep to the same limitations of what to manipulate within the actor as you would within actions. Requires that the External Actor implements BPI_ExternalAction and the ExternalAction component. See BP_GA_DemoDoor for an example.

nodes.excerpt: BP_Action_Delay Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Actions/BP_Action_Delay .. cpp:class:: BP_Action_Delay : public BP_Action_C…

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_Delay
frontmatter.description: Adds a delay to the action queue. Using an EndDelay for the previous action is preferrable if it achieves the same result, as you'll need to spawn one less action.

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_ClearAllTileMarkers
frontmatter.description: Clears all types of tile markers displayed at the time of this action being played. Generally called when pressing the End Turn button.

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_AnimatePuppet
frontmatter.description: Calls on puppet to play an animation specified by a gameplay tag. If specified, waits for puppet to play animation (handled by the puppet) before ending the action.

nodes.excerpt: BP_Action_Attack Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Actions/BP_Action_Attack .. cpp:class:: BP_Action_Attack : public BP_Action_C…

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_Attack
frontmatter.description: Calls on puppet to play an attack animation, ending the action once the puppet calls an animation hit event. Generally you want to have queued an action for displaying damage dealt right after this action, as it only handles animating the attack.

frontmatter.title: BP_Action_CameraFollowActor
frontmatter.description: Tells the grid camera to follow the specified actor

frontmatter.title: BP_ActionQueueCounter
frontmatter.description: Not an action. This counter is used by the action system to keep track of which action is currently being played by the client and which actions can safely be destroyed (from the owning client's perspective)

nodes.excerpt: BP_Action Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Actions/BP_Action .. cpp:class:: BP_Action : public Actor Actor with logic set up…

frontmatter.title: BP_Action
frontmatter.description: Actor with logic set up with common logic needed for actions. Actions are responsible for visualizing most of what is happening in the game to the player. When spawned actions are automatically queued in an Action Manager (the default one if not manually overriden). They will then be played in sequence, calling PlayAction. When an action is done, make sure to call EndAction so the Action Manager will proceed.

nodes.excerpt: BP_ActionManager Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/BP_ActionManager .. cpp:class:: BP_ActionManager : public Actor Loops over an…

frontmatter.title: BP_ActionManager
frontmatter.description: Loops over an array of Action actors and play them in sequence. One Action Manager is spawned by the GameState at startup and is considered the default Action Manager. When an action is spawned it is automatically added to the queue of this default Action Manager unless specified otherwise.

frontmatter.title: BP_Ability_MoveAttack
frontmatter.description: Ability that combines movement and attacking in one. An example of how to set up an ability for units that don't use the AbilitySystem component and thus can only have a single ability.

frontmatter.title: BP_AbilityBase_Idle
frontmatter.description: The ability that is by default active when no other ability is active, such as when no unit is selected or it is not the owning player's turn. If the owning player is the ActivePlayer, allows for selecting units if the Strategy turn manager is used. Otherwise just shows the hover marker and holds no other functionality.

nodes.excerpt: BP_Ability_Attack Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Abilities/BP_Ability_Attack .. cpp:class:: BP_Ability_Attack : public BP…
BP_ATBTT_State Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/BP_ATBTT_State .. cpp:class:: BP_ATBTT_State : public GameState Along with…

frontmatter.title: BP_ATBTT_State
frontmatter.description: Along with basic game state duties, serves as a common blueprint to call on to get references to important singleton blueprints.

nodes.excerpt: BP_ATBTT_Strategy Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/BP_ATBTT_Strategy .. cpp:class:: BP_ATBTT_Strategy : public BP_ATBTT_C Same…

frontmatter.title: BP_ATBTT_Strategy
frontmatter.description: Same as BP_ATBTT, but with BP_TurnManager_Initiative set as the Turn Manager

nodes.excerpt: BP_Ability_Move Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Abilities/BP_Ability_Move .. cpp:class:: BP_Ability_Move : public BP_Ability_C…
BP_AbilityBase Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Abilities/BP_AbilityBase .. cpp:class:: BP_AbilityBase : public Actor Holds…

frontmatter.title: BP_AbilityBase
frontmatter.description: Holds core functionality which will generally be shared by all abilities, including ones not owned by units. Handles taking and validating input from the Player Controller and setting up the GridUI for the ability.

nodes.excerpt: BP_ATBTT_Initiative Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/BP_ATBTT_Initiative .. cpp:class:: BP_ATBTT_Initiative : public BP_ATBTT_C…

frontmatter.title: BP_ATBTT_Initiative
frontmatter.description: Same as BP_ATBTT, but with BP_TurnManager_Initiative set as the Turn Manager

frontmatter.title: BP_ATBTT
frontmatter.description: Sets up the game and handles login events.

frontmatter.title: BP_Ability
frontmatter.description: Parent of all ability blueprints. Handles both displaying and executing the ability for players as well as calculating the value of its use for AI units.

frontmatter.title: BPI_ExternalAction
frontmatter.description: Add to actors you want to serve as external actions, in which you want to play actions as if they were BP_Action type actors by using BP_Action_ExternalAction. Also add BP_ExternalAction_Component

BP_GridManager Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Grid/BP_GridManager .. cpp:class:: BP_GridManager : public Actor Spawns the…

frontmatter.title: BP_GridManager
frontmatter.description: Spawns the grid and all grid based arrays. Holds the location on the grid of all actors and the walkability between tiles. Runs pathfinding, visibility and all other grid-based code. Holds many such functions that are generally called by other blueprints. Also responsible for instantiating meshes.
